item.title: ::resetattack
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

That’s not a good idea. If someone trains to 99 attack, 1 strength, 1 defence, they will have 90+ hp. Then, they use the command, and they are a level 30ish with 90+ hp.

Read full topic

item.title: ::resetattack
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

So, Im looking to make a ::resetattack command, for people who have accidently trained too high.

Here is what I have:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resetattack") && playerRights >= 0) { removeSkillXP(10000000, 0); sM("Your attack stats have been reset!"); }

The problem is, if the user has lets say 9M XP, the account will go into -1M XP.

Any way around this?

Read full topic
